parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Conversations

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if conversation topic was registered to given person. See [[Conversations]] for more details.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[kbHasTopic]] topicName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> topicName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_obiHasTopic = [[player]] [[kbHasTopic]] "helloThereGeneralK";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>if ([[player]] [[kbHasTopic]] "dontShoot") then { [[player]] [[kbRemoveTopic]] "dontShoot"; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Conversations]], [[kbAddTopic]], [[kbTell]], [[kbReact]], [[kbRemoveTopic]], [[kbAddDatabase]], [[kbAddDatabaseTargets]], [[FSM]], [[FSM Editor]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
